players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "This is terrible! Bob's gone already. We need to work together here - has anyone noticed anything suspicious? I'm looking at everyone equally right now."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of a more random choice? This seems rushed."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie because I had a gut feeling, and it paid off. Alice, are you defending the mafioso? That's highly suspicious."

Charlie: "Diana, that's a very convenient claim to make when you can't prove it. If you were really the detective, wouldn't you be more careful about revealing yourself so early? This feels like a desperate mafia play to me."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
